topic_list.topic: Introduction of the project and team building
Financial targets, cost constraints and marketing plan of the new remote control
Style and features of the new remote control
Function of the new remote control

tokenized_answer: The group introduced themselves and their roles to each other.
The Project Manager introduced the project aim and agenda to the group.
The group acquainted themselves with the meeting-room equipment by drawing on the whiteboard.
The Project Manager discussed the projected production cost and price point for the device.
The group began a discussion about their own experiences with using remote controls and about usability features to be included in the design.

The Project Manager instructed the Industrial Designer to prepare the working design, the User Interface Designer to research technical functions, and the Marketing Expert to prepare the user requirement specification.
The group discussed the function of the prototype and decided that they should restrict the remote to television for the time being.
The Industrial Deigner will prepare the working design.
The User Interface Designer will research technical functions.
The Marketing Expert will prepare the user requirement specification.
The group discussed the function of the prototype and decided that they should restrict the remote to television for the time being instead of allowing it to control multiple devices.

general_query_list.answer: Project Manager gave the team members a brief introduction of the new remote control project, then the team started an ice breaking game by drawing their favourite animals. The expected selling price of the remote control is 25 Euros and the production costs would be limited to twelve and a half Euro per unit. Marketing plan would depend on overhead costs. The team agreed that the remote needs to be robust, and they wanted it to be a device for all with accessible buttons. Project Manager suggested it to be only a television remote control instead of a multi-functional one.

specific_query_list.query: Summarize the discussion about the style and features of the remote control.
specific_query_list.answer: The team agreed that the device needed to be robust so that it wouldn't get damaged easily. As for the features, the team believed that fewer buttons on the remote control would make it easier to use. Besides, a combined remote was favoured, as it can be a device for more than one remote. However, the team believed that the two features are mutually exclusive.

explainable_answer.answer_sentence: The team agreed that the device needed to be robust so that it wouldn't get damaged easily.

evidence.speaker: Project Manager
evidence.content: Okay , so so basically we're looking for some um {disfmarker} we're looking for a device that is um robust

evidence.speaker: Project Manager
evidence.content: and and therefore uh won't get damaged too easily .

explainable_answer.answer_sentence: As for the features, the team believed that fewer buttons on the remote control would make it easier to use.

evidence.speaker: Marketing
evidence.content: Um one of the things um we found from the market research is that people often get confused by the number of buttons on them as well .

evidence.speaker: Marketing
evidence.content: 'Cause there's quite often lots and lots .

evidence.speaker: Project Manager
evidence.content: 'cause you want you want simplicity as well ,

evidence.speaker: Project Manager
evidence.content: you want any idiot to be able to use it .

explainable_answer.answer_sentence: Besides, a combined remote was favoured, as it can be a device for more than one remote.

evidence.speaker: User Interface
evidence.content: So if you've got a combined system , it could be a combined remote .

evidence.speaker: Project Manager
evidence.content: So a device for for all remotes .

evidence.speaker: Project Manager
evidence.content: Whilst at the same time you want , as you rightly said , one remote for all .

explainable_answer.answer_sentence: However, the team believed that the two features are mutually exclusive.

evidence.speaker: Project Manager
evidence.content: And so these are probably mutually exclusive options

specific_query_list.query: What did Industrial Designer think of the style of the new remote control?
specific_query_list.answer: Industrial Designer thought that a remote with more accessible buttons can make it easier to use, as some of the buttons of the remote he used were too small to press. He also suggested that the remote needs to be robust, so that it would not be damaged easily.

explainable_answer.answer_sentence: Industrial Designer thought that a remote with more accessible buttons can make it easier to use, as some of the buttons of the remote he used were too small to press.

evidence.content: Um sort of easy to use so the buttons are accessible .

explainable_answer.answer_sentence: He also suggested that the remote needs to be robust, so that it would not be damaged easily.

specific_query_list.query: What did Marketing suggest when discussing the features of the new remote and why?
specific_query_list.answer: He suggested that they could develop a remote control which moves around the room, so that the customer does not need to get up to pick up the remote in the other room. However, he also made clear that it is only an idea for the future.

explainable_answer.answer_sentence: He suggested that they could develop a remote control which moves around the room, so that the customer does not need to get up to pick up the remote in the other room.

evidence.speaker: Marketing
evidence.content: And um sometimes uh they sort of {disfmarker} remote controls defeat their own purpose

evidence.speaker: Marketing
evidence.content: because you're sat in the chair and the remote is somewhere else in the room .

evidence.speaker: Marketing
evidence.content: now you have to get up to sort of pick up the remote .

evidence.speaker: Marketing
evidence.content: we need to sort of maybe think about how um we could maybe uh develop a remote control which moves around the room .

specific_query_list.query: Summarize the discussion about the function of the remote control.
specific_query_list.answer: Marketing suggested that they could develop the remote control into a hand held mini laptop, so that it could control all sorts of appliances. But at the end of the meeting, they made the decision that the new remote control would not be a multi-functional one, and it would only be designed for television.

explainable_answer.answer_sentence: Marketing suggested that they could develop the remote control into a hand held mini laptop, so that it could control all sorts of appliances.

evidence.content: I mean we've done some research um about sort of you know what the cutting edge sort of hand held devices are ,

evidence.speaker: Marketing
evidence.content: and a lot of them sort of use you know they're like they're like mini laptops .

evidence.speaker: Marketing
evidence.content: So it's possible that we could devise a system where where you're you're basically sort of holding a a miniature computer which is controlling all your your sort of your television , your stereo ,

explainable_answer.answer_sentence: But at the end of the meeting, they made the decision that the new remote control would not be a multi-functional one, and it would only be designed for television.
